title: (x) Online!/Blueprint scripts - MeMimas/Fling {Sharon Van Lieu, Florian}
content:
hi everyone!  
i LOVE these fonts and i have no idea how to find them. please advise. thanks! :-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109021744im_/http:/typophile.com/files/home_slot1font_3680.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109021744im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ms-blueprint-logo_3662.jpg.gif)
author: juliet

comments.content: And the first one is [MeMimas](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109021744/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/type_o_tones/memimas_bold/?sample_text=Online!&sample_size=74) by Joan Barjau & José Manuel Urós.
Next time, please post your request in the appropriate place, i.e. [the Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109021744/http:/typophile.com/forum/29). Thanks!
WOW. you guys ROCK. worry flovian--i am new to this forum and just realized i posted in the wrong place. blah!
